comment.author: 39839593@N00
comment._content: This café is located on 54 Amstel and it is still a café today. The tram doesn't run there anymore. Here is the present-day view, courtesy of Google Streetview.

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content:
Michiel2005: Thank you Michiel! Once again, you have helped us locate a photo. We really appreciate, and the address will be added to our database. 
The café (or ale house in 1934) looks quite unchanged, that's nice!
/Anna B.

comment._content: So lovely that it still exists!
